MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Dykehead Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:20am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:02 AM on Monday, 15 March 2021.
